title:
There used to be this new age bookstore that was otw to Wrightsville that I would go to with my mom when I was maybe 11 or 12, early 90s. Could get like crystals, tarot cards, candles, that kind of thing. We even went to a couple seminars there.



I always look for it when I drive out here, even though I'm sure it isn't there anymore, and I can't remember exactly where it was. But makes me sad, I want to go.
